short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Your digital grocery receipts and spending analytics for Woolies, BWS, Coles. Aggregate all you digital receipts in one place

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Update to version 2.0.8 for:
- Fix for new Everyday Rewards website design (you still need to open Activity page to make the extension enabled!)
- Fix for Coles authentification flow when authentification was interrupted before you can finish entering credentials

--------

You can find your digital receipts (in-store and online shops) in the chains' mobile apps and websites. Just scan your reward cards! 

But you can do more now with these! 
- Download all your digital eReceipts in one click from retailers' sites,
- Save as Excel, or 
- Automatically create a digital interactive dashboard with detailed analytics about your grocery spending! 

No downloading one-by-one, no collection paper clips, no scanning, no typing in! Just log in!
1) Control your expenses,
2) track prices and savings,
3) prepare for tax time!

EASY TO USE
Install this extension and approve permissions - all you need to do. When you visit Coles or Woolworths Rewards websites next time, you will find a new 'magic button' in the bottom left corner, which will help you to download and process your shopping data in just one click!

INTEGRATION WITH DASHBOARD
You may opt-in to upload your data (in just one click!) to your secure individual shopping dashboard at `myshopdash.app`. It will enrich your data, show the departments and aisles you spend your money the most, and display many other insights for you!
Highly recommended!

DESIGNED WITH PRIVACY IN MIND
This extension works directly in your browser. Your data is not shared without your consent; your credentials are never shared over the Internet. Your shopping data is saved on your computer. Your most sensitive data, such as login credentials, passwords, and card numbers, are never saved or shared.

If you opt-in to use the external dashboard site as described above, your shopping details will be encrypted and sent there but will not be shared further except for the purposes of building your dashboard. Nobody will have access to it. Your sensitive data. such as passwords and credit card data, will NOT be sent over at all.
